text: O vy, kotoryye uverovali v Istinu Allakha i poklonyayetes' Yemu! Yesli vy povinuyetes' Yemu i slushayete Yego nazidaniya tayno i otkryto, On daruyet vam sposobnost' razlichat' v dushe istinu i lozh' i nisposhlot vam pobedu, kotoraya otdelit vas ot vashikh vragov. On ochistit vas ot vashikh zlykh del i prostit vashi pregresheniya. Allakh Vsevyshniy - Obladatel' velikoy milosti i shchedrosti
